name: Falling Point Error
description:
MISSION BACKGROUND:

YEAR: 2082.

LOCATION: NASA SPACE CENTER, HOUSTON.

RESEARCH INTO BLACK HOLES UNVEILS TROUBLING DISCOVERIES.

POSSIBLE PROOF OF A SIMULATED UNIVERSE.

PHYSICAL PHENOMENA SURROUNDING BLACKHOLES DOESNT MATCH QUANTUM OR CLASSICAL THEORIES.

PHENOMENA RESEMBLES GLITCHES SEEN IN MODERN TECHNOLOGY DUE TO PHYSICAL LIMITATIONS.

BLACK HOLE ORBITAL MISSION PLANNED TO EXAMINE PHENOMENA FURTHER.

CONTROLS:

  • Do nothing to fall
  • Hold Space or Left Mouse Button to fall faster
